_header: Alas how shall my heart be light
Title(s): ‘For loue Alas my lyue ys lorne’
_description: ‘For loue Alas my lyue ys lorne’ — three stanzas

NLWPen26.First Lines: Alas howe schale my hert be Lyght…

Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
